title: novaPDF Lite 8.8
text:

Every day we offer FREE licensed software you’d have to buy otherwise. $29.99 Giveaway of the day — novaPDF Lite 8.8 Create PDF files from any printable document, emails, documents, web pages etc User rating: 2 (50%) 2 (50%) 2 comments 
novaPDF Lite 8.8 is available as a Giveaway of the day! You have limited time to download and install it. Download Now novaPDF Lite 8.8 Terms and conditions 
novaPDF Lite allows you to create PDF files from any printable document, including emails, Microsoft Office documents, web pages, text. It works as a printer driver and you can print from any Windows application that supports printing - just set novaPDF Lite as the default printer and the document will be converted and saved as PDF file. Features include: customizable resolution, document information, predefined page size, quality settings and much more.   XP/ Vista/ 7/ 8/ 8.1/ 10 (x32/x64); Windows Server 2003/ 2008/ 2012 Publisher:
